questions:
Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Under a bridge
D) In a residential area

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A bridge and water
C) A group of people
D) A mountain

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A waterbody under a bridge
C) A bridge with graffiti
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Tall buildings
B) A forest
C) A park
D) More water and vegetation

A) A sandy beach
B) A concrete slab and water
C) A street
D) A playground

What is the relationship between the bridge and the water?
A) The bridge is above the water
B) The bridge is submerged in water
C) The bridge is next to the water
D) The bridge is far from the water

What type of vegetation is visible in the photo?
A) Cacti
B) Pine trees
C) Grass and bushes
D) Trees with overhanging branches

A) Clear and calm
B) Murky and foamy
C) Frozen
D) Dry

B) Old and worn
